title: Bug 50059: Resources not served from /WEBINF/lib/{.jar}/METAINF/resources with metadatacomplete="true" in web.xml
description: Bug 50059: Resources are not served from /WEBINF/lib/{.jar}/METAINF/resources if metadatacomplete="true" is set in web.xml. Creating a Servlet 3.0 webapp named 'foo' with metadatacomplete="true" attribute set on the webapp element in /WEBIBNF/web.xml.
OB: When metadatacomplete="true" is applied to the webapp in web.xml, the resources from /WEBINF/lib/{.jar}/METAINF/resources are not accessible.
EB: The resources should be accessible when the jar (let's call it 'bar.jar') is placed in /WEBINF/lib.
SR:
1. Create a Servlet 3.0 webapp named 'foo'.
2. Set metadatacomplete="true" on the webapp element in /WEBIBNF/web.xml.
3. Place the jar 'bar.jar' in /WEBINF/lib.
4. Attempt to access resources from /WEBINF/lib/{.jar}/METAINF/resources.
